
get-login-profile
*****************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Retrieves the user name and password create date for the specified
user.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws iam get-login-profile
     --user-name <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--user-name"  (string)
   Name of the user whose login profile you want to retrieve.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
